meanings: It has become bright in front of one's eyes
It has become bright in front of one's eyes
It is pitch-black in front of one's eyes
It is pitch-dark in front of one's eyes
glimmer in front of one's eyes

meanings.meaning: be staring somebody in the face

vlive.korean: [성공이 눈앞이로구나~] 오케이! [It's about to succeed] Okay! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
[고지가 눈앞][드디어 넘은 휴닝카이의 벽!] 잠깐! [The finish line is visible] [Finally overcame HUENINGKAI's barrier] Wait! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [The finish line is visible] [Finally overcame HUENINGKAI's barrier] Wait!

vlive.korean: [사진이 흐린 게 아닌 것 같은데 내 눈앞이 흐린 것 같은데... 눈물 나는데 지금...] [I don't think it's the picture that's fuzzy... I think it's my tears...] View video V PICK! : [SF9] (우당탕) 타지야~ 미안해~ 나도 어쩔 수 없는 셒구인가봐~ (우당탕) (JAEYOON talking about newly-coined word)
vlive.english: [I don't think it's the picture that's fuzzy... I think it's my tears...]

vlive.korean: [이렇게 예쁜 사람이 눈앞에 있는데] 말을 왜 이렇게 다 예쁘게 하시냐 응? [Because we have a beautiful person in front of our eyes] How can you say so beautifully? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [ATEEZ] 🌎: 내가 가슴이 뜁니다..! (산이 사진을 보여주며🤳) (SAN talking about his past story)
vlive.english: [Because we have a beautiful person in front of our eyes] How can you say so beautifully?

vlive.korean: 지금 제 눈 앞에는... In front of me... 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : IZ*ONE 에너지 캠 플러스(ENOZI Cam +) 아이즈원, 태국 마트에 가다!

examples.korean: The words danced before her tired eyes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 지친 두 눈 앞에서 활자들이 춤을 추는 것 같았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The words danced before her tired eyes. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The helicopter landed before our astonished eyes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 깜짝 놀라는 우리 눈앞으로 헬리콥터가 내려앉았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The helicopter landed before our astonished eyes. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The writing blurred and danced before his eyes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 눈 앞에 있는 글씨가 흐릿해지더니 춤을 추는 것 같았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The writing blurred and danced before his eyes. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Get out of my sight! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내 눈 앞에서 사라져! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Get out of my sight! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There was a blinding flash and the whole building shuddered. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 눈앞이 안 보이게 섬광이 번쩍이더니 건물 전체가 흔들렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There was a blinding flash and the whole building shuddered. Add to Wordbook
